author: SaintElsewhere
title: Finally, a video game based on my favourite theme.
review: When I got my first Batman sets, (Catwoman Pursuit and Hunt for Killer Croc on the same day) I thought: "Finally, my two greatest loves combined. Batman and Lego, together at last." And now I have the video game to go along with my sets. This game features a brand-new soryline featuring all of the characters from the actual sets, plus a few who aren't part of the theme YET. (Hint, Lego, hintedy hint hint.) As usual there is the delightfully jovial tongue-in-cheek attitude that Lego puts in all their games, as well as the sometimes puzzling but not too difficult gameplay. A MAJOR improvement from Lego Indiana Jones is that the canisters and power bricks are MUCH more difficult to find. I say this as a good thing because I'm almost done story mode and I want to be doing Free Play for as long as possible.

author: legocolecter_abu__h919
title: Gotham City is under the hands of a ummm, Bricked crusader and his ummm lego wonder

author: Jawsant
title: Great Game, Great Price
review:
Well, Lego has gone out of there way and made another exelante video game based off of a great series.

Pros:
+Great price.
+Graphics are good.
+Good storyline
+good charectors.

Cons:
-Could of had more characters.

Overall: 9.5/10
